title: Cap, 18th–19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, linen, metallic thread
Technique: embroidered
description: Cap with metallic embroidery on red velvet with a symmetrical plant motif, confronted birds and a double-headed eagle in the center of the crown. Simple floral vine pattern on the brim. Brim very broad in the front and narrow in the back. Inside lined with printed linen, possibly from the first half of the eighteenth century, in a brown and blue floral pattern on a red ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cap, 18th–19th century.Medium: silk, linen, metallic thread
Technique: embroidered. 1975-3-3.
